plot: The misadventures of two foreigners and their Chinese landlord and his daughter as they attempt and mostly fail to bridge the cultural gap.
plot_en: The misadventures of two foreigners and their Chinese landlord and his daughter as they attempt and mostly fail to bridge the cultural gap.
plot_es: The misadventures of two foreigners and their Chinese landlord and his daughter as they attempt and mostly fail to bridge the cultural gap.
title: No Pets or Foreigners
